12.content:
Hi my name is Sim. Or was. At the beginning, I didn't remember what I looked like. Guy, girl, cute, ugly, fat, toothpick, tall, short... whatever I was is now gone but my name and a Pokemon card I had before my old items was replaced. Its a Jirachi card. Weird right? And my name. I can't tell if its a guy or girl name. I am writing this down in my diary cause it feels like I should and god, how it feels so good this all down on paper. I've been screaming inside for months to tell someone whats been happening to me. I will write this out as a third person point of view so you could get a better feel of my story. Well, enjoy the ride.

         May woke up. Or that kinda what she first thought she felt that was wrong. She quickly rethought that and, very hard, remember that her name is Sim. Sim felt different. She sat on the floor looking around. Her room is a mess. The book shelf laid on its side holding the door closed. Books laid scattered across the floor. The mattress slid off where it should be and the blankets laid underneath her. Her first thought was 'WTF?' than she stopped herself from freaking out try to address the problem. First things first, try to clean up her room.

         A few minutes later, everything went back where it should be. Sim sigh a job well done and now trying to figure out whats going on. She went to lay on the floor with the blanket under her, that must is true but why? And why did she think her name was May? Sensing why, she ran to her big mirror to take a look. Sim jump back a few feet. her hands went t her hair and felt how long it is (C:UsersOwnerPictures7e09ddc715f8967b26b7a1e90547105d665a5483.jpg). She looked down at the mirror and saw her pants and panties were pulled. Her face started going red and she pulled them up. But it was certain. She became May. Now is time to freak out. But she was in too much of a shock to anything but stare.

         When Sim (after 30 minutes) got use to see her self in or as May. She is May now and there is so many things try like if she had Poke-balls or something. Sim patted herself on her pants to see what kinda fabric it is. Silk. Heart rate went up. She is in a new body. 'No' she thought to herself, 'I got to find out what my family will think of this.' Beneath her silent thoughts, she wonder how differently she will think when she finds out what gender she was.
12.title: Sim the May

13.content:
The moment you wake up your nose is assaulted by a horrible smell. You also find that you have woken up in a completely different place than you went to sleep in. After a few moments of observing your surroundings you determine that you are shrunk and inside a sneaker. The shoe is vary worn and thus has a rancid smell to it.

Before you begin trying to get out you notice someone else is in the room. You see Misty in her socks walking towards making getting out more urgent than before. You try desperately to climb out of the shoe only for Misty's socked foot to push you back in. Your head is pushed into the toe section face down forcing your face into the smelly insole. One of the socked toes begins rubbing the back of your head before you feel your entire body lifted into the air and than thrown back down to the ground as she takes a step. The immeasurable amount of pain gives you the feeling that you might not make it out alive.

133.content:
The horrible feeling of her wet sock is only amplified as Misty's movement starts to increase. You realize that she is now going for a jog, and you being stuck under her nasty socked toes, are along for the ride. You try your best to resituate yourself but the thick toe jam within the shoe keeps you glued in place, your face pressed firmly against the nasty sole of her stinky sock, forced to inhale the cheesy stench of her toxic foot funk. As Misty continues running, the humidity within the shoe increases immensely and it's becoming difficult to breathe in the hot, smelly air. You start seeing colors and feel nauseous, pleading within your mind for fresh air.

"Ch...cheesy stink....pleaseeeee...m...make it stop!" you beg in silence.

As if to answer your prayers, the movement stops, and you hear the laces start to untie. A huge wave of light enters the rancid sneaker as Misty removes her foot, and you inhale a long breath of fresh air (well, as fresh as it can be, as you are still in the toe section of her stinky shoe). You manage to pry yourself off of the crusty, sweat soaked insole, and walk over to the opening of the shoe. You stare at the goddess above you, she is sitting on a park bench, peeling off her socks, tugging hard, as the sweat makes them stick to her moist soles. With a final grunt she pulls off the socks and takes a sniff, shrugging her shoulders in acceptance. She shoves her socks in her other shoe and you climb out of Misty's shoe, trying to get her attention. Finally she spots you and picks you up.

"Well look at you," she says menacingly "perfect to be my foot slave."

You begin to panic and plead for her mercy, but she just laughs and decides to...

Your point of view



As soon as Misty stops running, you can hear her heavy breathing as she's approached by an unknown number of other females.


"It's about time you showed up Misty." Said the eldest of the female voices.

"I'm sorry. I had a hard time finding the smelliest socks i could find. It would be rude of me not to give our hosts something good to sniff for the whole day now wouldn't it?" Said Misty as she started flexing her toes, grinding you further into her smelly insole.

1341.title: My sisters were inside waiting for me

13413.content:
Author note



Now I'm sure most of you are confused with the plot I've been setting up up to this point, so here's how it goes. Misty and her sisters heard about this new shoe store that opened up recently, and they heard that not only do the people who work there do a good job selling shoes and such, but they also care to their customers feet while they wait for more shoes to try on. So they decided to go on in and see just how good the place and people who worked there really were.


When they arrived, they soon found out that there were four men and four woman of differing age groups who worked the store together, each tending to the customers of their age groups needs. So the sisters decided to try on some shoes and have their feet massaged while they waited. However, while the youngest of the sisters was having her feet massaged, she quickly fell asleep from the good job he was doing. But she woke up just as quickly when she felt him using her feet to get him off.


What happened next? She screamed of course. You wake up to a man who was massaging your feet a minute ago now using them to jerk himself off is a good reason to scream for help. Luckily for the store keepers, the only ones in the store at the time were themselves and the sisters. But when everyone came to check up on the screams, the sisters wanted an explanation from the store keepers on what just happened. But they found that all their attentions were on the sisters feet as they tried to come up with an excuse for their partner's actions.


Soon enough, the sisters put two and two together and realized that all the workers, and not just the one who preformed the act of using the youngest sister's feet to jerk himself off, all had a foot fetish. When confronted, the store keepers were both ashamed and afraid. Now that the jig was up, they thought the sisters were going to tell everyone about what happened. They wouldn't get anymore customers as a result, and they would have to close shop as well.


But the sisters had another idea in mind. They told the store keepers in exchange for keeping their traps shut, the store keepers would, every three months, give them access to all their new shoes and accessory's that they wanted for free. And as an added bonus, they would let them do anything they wanted with their feet for that day only. And the rest, is history. And now, we can get back to the story.
13413.title: Explaining the current plot

1343.content:
When i looked around the store, i saw that i was the only one inside.


"Hello? Is anyone here?" I shouted as i started walking through the isles, slowly making my way to the employe lounge.


"Hey! I got locked inside the store. Can someone let me out?" I soon found the lounge and opened the door where i was greeted be the sight of nobody around.


"*Sigh* There really isn't anyone in here." Then i turned back the way i came, walked into a random isle, and sat on one of the leather chairs before sighing once again.


"*Sigh* Now what am i supposed to do?" Then i looked around me and saw all the shoes just waiting to be tried on and taken home by new owners. And that gave me an idea.


"Well, if I'm really stuck in here until they open up again, i guess they won't mind me trying on their shoes like i intended on doing anyway." The i walked up to a box of shoes on the shelf and pulled out a pair of--

Cynthia was sitting and enjoying her ice cream when suddenly she felt something between her toes. She just barely felt it, but knew she definitely felt something. She just dismissed it as nothing important and decided to walk back home. You had no idea you were this close to being discovered but kept it up anyway. And you were hoping it would end soon, you didn't even have any idea where she was headed. Though even if you did, you didn't quite know where you were to start with. You did however know that you had been here long to enough that you could assume that any fat or muscle you had was flattened out of you.

And yet the girl in question continues to walk at varying paces, completely unaware of the fact that anything alive as a whole was under her foot. But in the end, to settle something, where was it that she was headed..?

1542221.content:
You woke up, dazed and confused, unknown to where you were. Feeling dazed, you looked around at your surroundings and suddenly a horrible stench filled your nostrils. You swayed on the spot, confused on your location. After looking around, you could see the walls were made of some kind of leather, and the ground was made of the same material. There was only one entrance of light in the room. In the darkest corner all you could see was five dark prints embedded into the leather.

Before your mind could process any of this, the stench made you collapse back downward. It was so thick you could honestly cut it. Just then, the ground shook.
Boom
You hurried toward the exit of the room and looked up. There, you saw a giant Serena, looking down at the entrance. Suddenly, you realized where you were. You franctically jumped up and down, attempting to get her attention , but to no avail. Her giant-black-socked foot slowly pushed through the hole of the boot, and went down into it. You make a break for the toe section, and you barely avoid getting smushed. As her giant toes push closer she seals you underneath, smothering you under her feet.

As Serena fastened both of her boots onto her feet, she felt a little pebble in her right shoe. It felt good, so she decided toe leave it there. Grabbing her bag, Serena decided to go to -

Did she hear you?
